data.name: Phantom Breaker: Omnia Promotional Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Phantom Breaker: Omnia Promotional Soundtrack includes the English and Japanese versions of "My Heartbeat For You" a promotional song which will be featured in the upcoming Character Reveal Trailer. Contains both MP3 192 kbps and Uncompressed WAV.


THE FIRE IN YOUR HEART IS BURNING!
Phantom Breaker: Omnia is a fast-paced 2-D anime fighting game that features 20 unique characters, pitted against one another to make their greatest wishes come true. The ability to choose between 3 fighting styles will appeal to seasoned gamers while making the game accessible to newcomers. The game features 2 guest characters, Kurisu Makise from Steins;Gate and Rimi Sakihata from Chaos;Head, as well as two brand new characters created specifically for Phantom Breaker: Omnia.

LYRICS

English Version
I turn my eyes to the new dawn
And feel the warm sun upon my face
A new age comes to life in front of me
Releasing us forever from this cage

I know that you can feel me

In these dreams
I'm calling out
Waking up
Open the door
I'll tear through the darkness
With my heartbeat for you

I hear the wind calling to me
It's beckoning me from far away
We'll never know what lies ahead for us
If we can't find a way to turn the page

I know that you can feel me

In these dreams
I'm calling out
Waking up
Open the door
I'll tear through the darkness

With my heartbeat for you

Can you feel me lost in this world?

In these dreams
I'm calling out
Waking up
Open the door
I'll tear through the darkness
With my heartbeat for you

Japanese Version
